&#3909;&#3954;: what; however; whatever; can indicate question: "Is ... (the case)?; who

[726] ... 1) dri tshig 'dri ba dang/ rtsod pa 'dzugs pa la 'jug pa'i spyi sgra zhig  ... de ci yin/ ... lta ci smos/ ... smos ci dgos/ ... khyed kyis yon tan gang dang ci shes/ ... ci bshad la ma nyan/ ci las la brtag dgos/ ... sha tsha snying gtam bshad par ko long gi gtam smra ba ci zer/ ... las ka ha ri hu ri byas na ci yong/ ... skad cha rdzig rdzig bshad pa ci mtshar/ ... 'gro ba mi skyob na snying rje bsgoms kyang ci la phan/ ... 2) yongs su khyab pa'i spyi sgra zhig  ... dbang cha ci mchis pa/ ... ci yod do 'tshal/ ... sems la ci snyam/ ... gtam ci smos pa/ ... dka' las cir yang mi rtsi ba/ ... las don ci bde bar bya ba/ ... grub 'bras ci 'dod pa bzhin du thob pa/ ... rang 'dod ci dgar byas mi chog ... 3) brtag cing dpyad pa'i bye brag la 'jug pa'i spyi sgra zhig  ... gang thub ci thub kyis rogs ram byed pa/ ... ci thub thub gyis/ ... mgyogs thabs ci nus kyis las ka byas pa/ ... mi dmangs kyi phugs don la phan thogs ci 'gro byed pa/ ...
how, what is, what, why?, wherefore, which, whatsoever, everything, what, ...'di...med par nothing left to do or say

for, what[ever] why, which, where, how much, and so as--as [rig pa ci yag: as clever as anyone; rags ci che as much help as possible; dngul ci yod: whatever $ I had ci byas: what I did]. for, what[ever] why, which, where, how much, and so as-as. 1) what? which? how? why?; 2) as much as, as good as, as many as, whatever [the], 35 ??

as best I could, trying their best. why {dga' bo myur bar 'gro ba ci} Nanda, why go so quickly?. 1) what, which. 2) how, why. 3) as much as, as good as, as many as, whatever the adj. 4) whatever. 5) no. 35 in numbering
